alert.note: Alert for Central Interior; Dalton Highway Summits; South Slopes Of The Central Brooks Range; Upper Koyukuk Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 16 at 2:29PM AKST until November 17 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow occuring. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches expected. * WHERE...South Slopes Of The Central Brooks Range, Upper Koyukuk Valley, Dalton Highway Summits and Central Interior. * WHEN...Until 3 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Interior; Dalton Highway Summits; South Slopes Of The Central Brooks Range; Upper Koyukuk Valley
